initial_warning.title: A mysterious old man approaches...
initial_warning.message:
"Beware the nights of Candledark! In three days time, the spirits will rise wreak havoc for the living.

Pumpkin wards will protect you. Ask your Carpenter about them."

candledark_start.title: Candledark Eve is here!
candledark_start.message: And....nothing. Crazy old man and his superstitious ramblings...

candledark_end.title: The old man has returned
candledark_end.message:
"Thought I was crazy, didn't you? I see you've survived your first Candledark. Maybe next time you'll listen to an old man, ay?

Here, have some candy to celebrate!"
